Name: Lost in Space
About the game: Lost in Space is an open space survival adventure game. You have received a distress signal from a spacecraft. Explore a galaxy full of adventures and save space traders from certain doom. Peculiarities: - Play a small campaign in single player mode. - Explore an amazing new world. - Go on an exciting journey!
